meta.title: Kobo Button | Fan made website
meta.description: Play random audio of Kobo Kanaeru

notice: This is unofficial and fan made website. The audio is taken and presented without any additional context. This website and its contents should not be used as a judgement to any mentioned or related party.
title: Kobo Button
playlistNotice: This audio can be enabled from the menu

setting.title: Settings
setting.controlDesc: Such as pause and volume control

about1.title: About Kobo Kanaeru
about1.p1: Kobo Kanaeru is a VTuber from hololive Indonesia. She loves singing and playing games in her live stream on Youtube.

about2.title: About Kobo Button
about2.p1: Kobo Button is unofficial and fan made website to play audio clip of Kobo. The types of audio available are words said by Kobo, sounds such as laughing and sneezing, and songs (if enabled via the settings above).
about2.p2: Thanks to the contributors involved in the development and maintenance of this website and special thanks to [Artist Name].
